definition: to translate again (i.e. to redo the same translation)/to translate repeatedly from one language to the next (so multiplying errors)

sentences.english: Retranslation is a necessity of literary translation.
sentences.chinese: 重譯或復譯是文學翻譯的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: The historicity of literary translation determines the necessity of retranslation;
sentences.chinese: 譯本的歷史性決定了重譯的必要性。

sentences.english: Mistranslations in retranslations are inevitable and they tend to accompany retranslations.
sentences.chinese: 重譯中誤譯是不可避免的，它們與重譯相伴相生。

sentences.english: Mistranslations in retranslations are inevitable and they tend to accompany retranslations.
sentences.chinese: 重譯中誤譯是不可避免的，它們與重譯相伴相生。
